Dashboard.title: Portfolio Dashboard
Dashboard.marketDataUnavailable: Market data unavailable. Showing portfolio from local data.
Dashboard.totalValueTooltip: Current market value of all your positions
Dashboard.totalInvestedTooltip: Total capital you invested (sum of all purchases)
Dashboard.totalPnLTooltip: Profit & Loss. Difference between current value and what you invested
Dashboard.dailyChangeTooltip: Change in your portfolio's value since yesterday's market close

Holdings.avgCostTooltip: Average price you paid per share
Holdings.pnlTooltip: Profit or Loss for this position
Holdings.dailyTooltip: Percentage change in price since yesterday
Holdings.weightTooltip: Percentage this position represents of your total portfolio

Transaction.title: Transaction History
Transaction.addDescription: Add a new stock purchase to your portfolio.
Transaction.errorSectorRequired: Sector is required for new tickers

Dividends.title: Dividends
Dividends.errorRequired: All fields required, amount must be positive

AIAdvisor.title: Portfolio Advisor
AIAdvisor.description: Claude analyzes your entire portfolio and gives you advice on diversification, risks, and suggested next purchases.

AIAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
AIAnalysis.description: Claude analyzes technical data, fundamentals, and your position to give you a simple summary with a verdict.

Technical.title: Technical Analysis
Technical.rsiTooltip: Relative Strength Index. Measures price momentum (0-100). Below 30 = oversold (potential opportunity), above 70 = overbought
Technical.sma20Tooltip: 20-day Simple Moving Average. Smooths price to show the trend
Technical.sma50Tooltip: 50-day Simple Moving Average. Smooths price to show the trend
Technical.sma200Tooltip: 200-day Simple Moving Average. Smooths price to show the long-term trend
Technical.macdTooltip: Moving Average Convergence/Divergence. Indicates changes in trend and momentum
Technical.bollingerTooltip: Volatility bands. Price tends to move between the upper and lower bands

Fundamentals.title: Fundamentals
Fundamentals.marketCapTooltip: Total company value in the market (price x outstanding shares)
Fundamentals.peTrailingTooltip: Price/Earnings ratio. How many times you pay annual earnings. Lower = cheaper
Fundamentals.peForwardTooltip: Estimated future Price/Earnings ratio. Lower = cheaper
Fundamentals.dividendYieldTooltip: Annual return percentage the company pays in dividends
Fundamentals.fiftyTwoWeekHighTooltip: Highest price in the last 52 weeks
Fundamentals.fiftyTwoWeekLowTooltip: Lowest price in the last 52 weeks
Fundamentals.targetMeanTooltip: Average target price according to Wall Street analysts
Fundamentals.targetHighTooltip: Highest target price according to analysts
Fundamentals.targetLowTooltip: Lowest target price according to analysts

Position.title: Your Position
Position.avgCostTooltip: Average price you paid per share
Position.totalInvestedTooltip: Total capital you invested in this position
Position.currentValueTooltip: Current market value of this position
Position.pnlTooltip: Profit or Loss for this position

Watchlist.title: Watchlist
Watchlist.empty: Your watchlist is empty. Add a ticker above to get started.

Opportunities.title: Buying Opportunities
Opportunities.scoreTooltip: Opportunity score (0-100). Higher = better time to buy based on technical indicators
Opportunities.vsSMA200Tooltip: Distance from price to 200-day average. Negative = below long-term trend
Opportunities.vs52WLowTooltip: Distance from price to 52-week low. Lower = closer to the floor
Opportunities.analystUpsideTooltip: Upside potential based on analyst target price

Guide.title: Opportunities Scanner Guide
Guide.description: How to interpret each metric in the table.
Guide.whatStocksDesc: It only analyzes stocks you already follow: your holdings (the ones you own) and your watchlist. To analyze a new stock, first add it to your watchlist.
Guide.scoreDesc: Starts at 50 (neutral) and adds or subtracts points based on 6 factors. Higher = better time to buy.
Guide.colSMA200: Distance to 200-day average. Negative = below long-term trend (could be an opportunity).
Guide.col52WLow: Distance to yearly low. Lower = closer to the floor.
Guide.colAnalystUpside: Upside potential according to Wall Street analysts. Green = they expect it to rise.
Guide.colSignals: Active technical signals. Green badges = buy, red = sell.
Guide.summaryText: it's a buy-timing scanner for stocks you already know. It doesn't tell you what to buy, but when might be a good time for something already on your radar.

Discovery.title: Discover Investments
Discovery.subtitle: Ask Claude about ETFs, sectors, or investment strategies
Discovery.placeholder: What type of investment are you looking for?

DCA.title: Monthly DCA Plan
DCA.subtitle: Claude suggests how to distribute your monthly investment
